responses.content: No reunion event at Seawatch/Riverwatch today. Thoron is on Grey Plains heading to Sighing Swamps. No advance.
No underlayer contact reused today. Thoron and Valania are traveling, not in Caras. No advance.
No Orcus contact today. Suzanne is in Khuzduk Hills, not with Thoron. No advance.
6 NPCs eligible. Resolving off-screen actions for NPCs not with PC.

state_changes.text: Guldur continues intelligence gathering in Khuzduk Hills; monitoring trade routes for Ironmask activity
Suzanne patrols Khuzduk Hills perimeter; restless, brooding on Orcus bond
Lalholm maintains religious liaison at Khuzdukan; consulting Thordak on ward stability
Lithoe continues counter-sequence research at Khuzdukan; Binding Degradation now 15/16 — urgency mounting
Captain Rendal increases Grey Plains patrols; bandit coordination worsening with spring trade
Henric Bale drills Fort Vanguard garrison; Vanguard Patrol reports ambiguous contact on eastern perimeter
